\

\Env_Quotation

EnvoiMoinsCher API quotation class.

The class is used to obtain informations about a quotation and, if possibly, order it.

Summary

Properties

$offers

$offers : array

Public variable represents offers array.

Structure :
$offers[x] => array(
  ['mode'] => data
  ['url'] => data
  ['operator'] => array(
    ['code'] => data
    ['label'] => data
    ['logo'] => data
  )
  ['service'] => array(
    ['code'] => data
    ['label'] => data
  )
  ['price'] => array(
    ['currency'] => data
    ['tax-exclusive'] => data
    ['tax-inclusive'] => data
  )
  ['collection'] => array(
    ['type'] => data
    ['date'] => data
    ['label'] => data
  )
  ['delivery'] => array(
    ['type'] => data
    ['date'] => data
    ['label'] => data
  )
  ['characteristics'] => data
  ['alert'] => data
  ['mandatory'] => array([...])
)

Type

array

Tags

None found

$order

$order : array

Public array containing order informations like order number, order date.

.. Structure :
  $orders[x] => array(
  ['ref'] => data
  ['date'] => data
  ['url'] => data
  ['mode'] => data
  ['offer']['operator'] => array(
    ['code'] => data
    ['label'] => data
    ['logo'] => data
  )
  ['service'] => array(
    ['code'] => data
    ['label'] => data
  )
  ['price'] => array(
    ['currency'] => data
    ['tax-exclusive'] => data
    ['tax-inclusive'] => data
  )
  ['collection'] => array(
    ['code'] => data
    ['type_label'] => data
    ['date'] => data
    ['time'] => data
    ['label'] => data
  )
  ['delivery'] => array(
    ['code'] => data
    ['type_label'] => data
    ['date'] => data
    ['time'] => data
    ['label'] => data
  )
  ['proforma'] => data
  ['alert'][x] => data
  ['chars'][x] => data
  ['labels'][x] => data
)

array

$palletDims

$palletDims : array

Protected variable with pallet dimensions accepted by EnvoiMoinsCher.com. The dimensions are given in format "length cm x width cm". They are sorted from the longest to the shortest.

To pass a correct pallet values, use the $palletDimss' key in your "pallet" parameter. Example :
$quotInfo = array(
  "collecte_date" => "2015-04-29",
  "delay" => "aucun",
  "content_code" => 10120,
  "pallet" => 130110
);
$this->makeOrder($quotInfo, true);

Type

array

Tags

None found

$shipReasons

$shipReasons : array

Protected variable with shipment reasons. It is used to generate proforma invoice.

Example : $quotInfo = array(
  "collecte_date" => "2015-04-29",
  "delay" => "aucun",
  "content_code" => 10120,
  "operator" => "UPSE",
  "reason" => "repair"
);
$this->makeOrder($quotInfo, true);

Type

array

Tags

None found

setType()

setType(String $type,  $dimensions) : Void

Function which sets informations about package.

Please note that if you send the pallet cotation, you can't indicate the dimensions like for other objects. In this case, you must pass the key from $palletDims protected variable. If the key is not passed, the request will return an empty result.

Parameters

String $type

Type : pli, colis, encombrant, palette.
$dimensions

Returns

Void

Tags

None found

makeOrder()

makeOrder( $quotInfo, mixed $getInfo) : boolean

Public function which sends order request.

If you don't want to pass insurance parameter, you have to make insurance to false in your parameters array ($quotInfo). It checks also if you pass insurance parameter which is obligatory to order a transport service.

The response should contains a order number composed by 10 numbers, 4 letters, 4 number and 2 letters. We use this rule to check if the order was correctly executed by API server.

Parameters

$quotInfo
mixed $getInfo

: Precise if we want to get more informations about order.

Returns

boolean —

: True if order was passed successfully; false if an error occured.

Tags

None found

getReasons()

getReasons(Array $translations) : Array

Public getter of shippment reasons

Parameters

Array $translations

Array with reasons' translations. You must translate by $this->shipReasons values, not the keys.

Returns

Array —

Array with shippment reasons, may by used to pro forma generation.

Tags

None found

makeDoubleOrder()

makeDoubleOrder( $quotInfo,  $getInfo) : boolean

Method which allowes you to make double order (the same order in two directions : from shipper to recipient and from recipient to shipper). It can be used by some stores for send a test product to customer and receive it back if the customer isn't satisfied.

Parameters

$quotInfo
$getInfo

Returns

boolean —

True if second order was passed successfully; false if an error occured.

Tags

None found

doRequest()

doRequest() : String

Function which executes api request.

If an error occurs, we close curl call and put error details in $this->errorText variable. We distinguish two situations with 404 code returned in the response :
  1) The API sets 404 code for valid request which doesn't contain any result. The type of response is application/xml.
  2) The server sets 404 code too. It does it for resources which don't exist (like every 404 web page). In this case the responses' type is text/html.

If the response returns 404 server code, we cancel the operation by setting $result to false, $respError to true and by adding an error message to $respErrorsList (with http_file_not_found value).

In the case of 404 API error code, we don't break the operation. We show error messages in setResponseError().

Returns

String

Inherited from
\Env_WebService

Tags

None found

parseResponse()

parseResponse(String $document) : Void

Function parses api server response.

First, it checks if the parsed response doesn't contain tag. If not, it does nothing. Otherwise, it makes $respError parameter to true, parses the reponse and sets error messages to $respErrorsList array.

Parameters

String $document

The response returned by API. For use it like a XPath object, we have to parse it with PHPs' DOMDocument class.

Returns

Void

Inherited from
\Env_WebService

Tags

None found
